title: Azure AI Evaluation Metrics
description: Metrics for Azure AI Evaluation service

prerequisites.messageMarkdown: To use these metrics and summary rule, you must use the Azure AI Evaluation services which are part of the Azure AI Foundry SDK.
`TargetingId` must be associated with your GenAI spans that are being evaluated.
Azure AI Evaluation spans must be sent to Azure Monitor, and be accessible in the Log Analytics workspace configured for use with Online Experimentation.
